title: Ye Se Jiang Ming
overview: Ai Lin, who had been blind for many years, unexpectedly regained her sight. She was excited and wanted to share the news with her husband, but she didn't expect to see him and the nanny making love in the living room. It turned out that her husband and the nanny had been sleeping secretly under her nose for a long time. Feeling angry and ashamed, Ai Lin decided to pretend to be blind and started playing mind games with them, so that her husband and nanny could experience the feeling of being fooled. In this way, both of them, became confused and suspicious of each other. But feeling that she already completed her revenge, she then decided to leave with her son. But what she never expected was that when the child came back from summer camp, she found that the "son" in front of her was not her own child! Ai Lin rushed to the police station like crazy to ask for help, but she didn't expect that she will meet there her husband stating that Ai Lin, lost her mind. Confused by all of this she starts to connect the facts, and tries to determine what is the truth and what is an illusion in her life.
